queries.sql: SELECT id, tags, st_simplifypreservetopology(geom, 250) as geom from osm_landuse_relations_tags_4
queries.original_sql: SELECT id, tags, geom as geom from osm_relations WHERE tags ? 'landuse' AND tags ->> 'type' = 'multipolygon'
queries.union_no_simplify: SELECT id, tags, geom as geom from osm_landuse_relations_tags_4
queries.union_simplify_20: SELECT id, tags, st_simplifypreservetopology(geom, 20) as geom from osm_landuse_relations_tags_4
queries.union_simplify_80: SELECT id, tags, st_simplifypreservetopology(geom, 80) as geom from osm_landuse_relations_tags_4
queries.union_simplify_200: SELECT id, tags, st_simplifypreservetopology(geom, 200) as geom from osm_landuse_relations_tags_4
